committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Elementary, Secondary, and Vocational Education

official_title: To establish a National Board on workforce skills and to develop a comprehensive school-to-work transition program for students in the United States.

summary.text: Workforce Readiness Act of 1992 - Title I: National Board on Workforce Skills - Establishes a National Board on Workforce Skills for the 21st Century. Title II: Work to School Transition Programs - Authorizes the Secretary of Education to make grants to local educational agencies to develop, implement, or expand programs which integrate workplace skills into the regular school curriculum to facilitate the transition from school to work. Sets forth reporting requirements. Authorizes appropriations for such grants and for the National Board.

titles.title: To establish a National Board on workforce skills and to develop a comprehensive school-to-work transition program for students in the United States.
